Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2

Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.commandMenuBar

package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.commandMenuBar
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint
     
    ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.controlPanels
     
    ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes
     
  • Class
    Description
    Command
    The Command interface defines a contract for executable actions within the paint application.
    CommandCopy
    The CommandCopy class implements the Command interface to handle copying the currently selected shape in the PaintModel.
    CommandCopyright
    The CommandCopyright class implements the Command interface to handle displaying a humorous copyright message.
    CommandCut
    The CommandCut class implements the Command interface to handle cutting the currently selected shape in the PaintModel.
    CommandDarkMode
    The CommandDarkMode class implements the Command interface to handle switching the application to a dark mode theme.
    CommandExit
    The CommandExit class implements the Command interface to handle exiting the application.
    CommandLightMode
    The CommandLightMode class implements the Command interface to handle switching the application to a light mode theme.
    CommandMenuBar
    CommandMenuBar is responsible for creating the "File", "Edit", "Accessibility", and "Help" menus, each containing different commands that the user can execute.(Constructor) This class implements the EventHandler interface to handle menu item actions, executing the appropriate command when a user selects a menu item.(handle method)
    CommandNew
    The CommandNew class implements the Command interface to handle creating a new canvas.
    CommandOpen
    The CommandOpen class implements the Command interface to handle opening a previously saved canvas file.
    CommandPaste
    The CommandPaste class implements the Command interface to handle pasting a copied or cut shape from the clipboard back into the canvas.
    CommandRedo
    The CommandRedo class implements the Command interface to handle redoing the last undone action in the PaintModel.
    CommandSave
    The CommandSave class implements the Command interface to handle saving the current canvas to a file.
    CommandUndo
    The CommandUndo class implements the Command interface to handle undoing the last action in the PaintModel.
